name: Baby Monitor
description:
Progressive web app (for preventing screen timeout) that should runs on an old phone placed in the room with a sleeping baby.
Once the microphone has a signal and the calculated decibel via the **Web Audio API** analyser reaches the given value several times, the app calls Your phone via the [Twilio API](https://www.twilio.com/docs/voice).

name: Depth
description:
Prototyping a web-app that shares a viewport between 2D web pages and a 3D background scene for easy idea prototyping, a personal playground platform.
Contains many separated pages for different purposes, like implementing _Tensorflow APIs_, commanding _WebGL_ with reactivity, etcetera.

name: 1_accustic
description: CSS only minted NFT.

name: serfozoiroda.hu
description: My brother’s static website in Hungarian language.

name: Vite Plugin Pug
description: Pug compiler for Vite builder.

name: CSS Tetris 3D
description: CSS 3D perspective experiment that implies the _Tetris_ game. _Tetromino_ aka block movement is implemented with Z-axis rotation.

name: My Repos Action
description: [GitHub Action](https://github.com/features/actions) that tetrieve your fresh and buried public project list via [GitHub GraphQL API](https://docs.github.com/en/graphql/overview/explorer) and populate this list in reverse-chronological order on your GitHub profile page.

name: Time Passing Lambda Image
description: [Netlify Lambda](https://docs.netlify.com/functions/overview/) that calculates the distance from a given date and now in formatted "time ago" words. This **serverless function** returns an embeddable PNG image in base64 encoded binary format.

name: A-Frame Warpspeed Texture
description: Component that set real-time calculated animation on a canvas as texture to the existing material of an entity. The main purpose is testing the (currently) experimental transferControlToOffscreen method.

name: Flow of Four
description: For JS13K gamejam.

name: Web Words
description:
Browser plugin that imports the entire saved dictionary from _Google Translate_ and shows the translated words on a tooltip on the webpage.
_(On hold until `manifest v3` update.)_

name: WAAπSynth
description: Web Audio Api Synthesizer. Connect Audio Graph Nodes.

name: Twitter Bot
description: Follower bot.

name: Depend On
description: Iterate through NPM package dependencies.

name: Chat Bot
description: Discord chatbot using Dialogflow agent.

name: JSON City
description: JSON formatter.

name: Whirled on the Spirit Spiral
description: For JS13K gamejam.

name: Road Pump
description: For Ludum Dare 41 gamejam.

name: SQLite Manager
description: SQLite plugin for Unity3D.

name: The Hunger Maims
description: For Ludum Dare 40 gamejam.

name: While Fly
description: Mobile game.

name: PersistData
description: Persistent store data at runtime in Unity3D. Hashmap behind the scenes, accept any kind of types. Singleton, keep data alive between scenes.

name: Help to Find Cats
description: For Global Archiact Jam.

name: PHP Cron
description: This script is able to execute scripts, like crontab. But more often.

name: GIF Animation Preview
description: _WordPress_ plugin that finds every GIF animation in a post and replaces it with an auto-generated preview image from the first frame of the animation and saves it to the post’s media directory. Tweakable smooth effect between the preview and animation while lazy loading big animation data on mobiles.

name: Modell
description: A PHP class for easily create/update/load database entries.

name: FacePlayer
description: Music player that retreive posted musics from Facebook groups and organised them into playlists.
